attributes.action: Ask all MPs to do wide spectrum drugs test 4 times a year.
attributes.background: I believe that the people who represent us in the political system should be held accountable when they are caught taking drugs, as they are the ones making the laws that are enforced upon us every day.

rejection.details:
You may like to sign the below petition which is currently open on this topic:

Make random drug/alcohol testing mandatory for Members of Parliament
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584162
